#include<stdio.h>
int count[100001];
int left[100001];
int binary(int f,int s,int e){
	if(left[e] < f){
		return 0;
	}
	int mid;
	int ret=0;
	while(s<=e){
		mid=(s+e)/2;
		if(left[mid]==f){
			ret=mid;
			e=mid-1;
		}
		if(left[mid] > f){
			e=mid-1;
		}
		else if(left[mid] < f){
			s=mid+1;
		}
	}
	return ret;
}


int main(){
	int counter=0;
	int i,j;
	for(i=2;i<=100000;i++){
		if(count[i]==0){
			counter++;
			for(j=i+i;j<=100000;j+=i){
				count[j]++;
			}
		}
		left[i]=counter;
	}
	int tc;
	scanf("%d",&tc);
	while(tc--){
	long long int n,k;
	scanf("%lld %lld",&n,&k);

	long long unsigned int countt=0;
	if(k==0){
		countt=n*(n-1)/2;
	}
	else{
	if(left[n] < k){
		countt=0;
	}
	else{
		for(i=2;i<=n;i++){
			if(count[i]==0){
			//	printf("left[i]=%d\n",left[i]);
				int g=binary(left[i]+k-1,i,n);
			//	printf("i =%d %d\n",i,g);
				if(g!=0){
				countt=countt+n-binary(left[i]+k-1,i,n)+1;
				//printf("i =%d %llu\n",i,countt);
				}
			}
			else{
				int g=binary(left[i]+k,i,n);
				//printf("left[i]=%d\n",left[i]);
				//printf("i =%d %d\n",i,g);
				if(g!=0){
				countt=countt+n-binary(left[i]+k,i,n)+1;
				//printf("i =%d %llu\n",i,countt);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	}
	printf("%llu\n",countt);
	}
	return 0;
}
